cast.name: 杰森·格里菲斯 Jason Griffith
丽莎·奥尔蒂斯 Lisa Ortiz

introduction: After 17 months of production and with the work of nearly 300 animators, the Sonic X Reanimate is finally here. The Sonic X Reanimate brings together animators and illustrators to reanimate the 5th episode of the Sonic X series, "Cracking Knuckles". This is a non-profit, fan-made project. It was made for fun, for free and is intended to be shared for free. It will not be monetized in any way. This reanimate was organized by me (Bilianna, formerly known as ILuvKnucklesShadow), and I am so happy to finally bring it out for the world to see. Thank you to all the artists and for everyone's support during the production of this project. I'm extremely proud of this team and very thankful to be the host.
